descriptionShort: Tote bag that converts to a backpack.
body:
I call this the Everything Bag; not only can you fit your whole life into it (while maintaining a sleek silhouette), but it also transitions eaily between a tote and a backpack!

This bag has two external pocket made from felt that has been dyed with onion skins.

Made from wool felt with leather straps and all-brass hardware. The felt may pill slightly during the first week or so of wear, but simply remove pills with a lint remover (or your fingers) and this will soon subside. 

Approximate dimensions: 18 in wide x 12 in tall x 7 in wide
name: AZ0068-002 Tote/Backpack
